QuestData.Title: Broken Controller
QuestData.Description:
It is too late for me, my friends.
The Controllers work us and work us and we have no rest.
We have lost so many.
Please, free the others! Don't let them share my fate!
QuestData.LogDescription: Free the slaves and destroy the Merciless Controller.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Tell Nevin Tideheart in Newhome of your success.
